articles.author: Lanre Bakare
articles.title: ‘They told me I was a savage’ – the unstoppable painter Everlyn Nicodemus - The Guardian
articles.description: She grew up in the shadow of Kilimanjaro and never knew racism until moving to Europe. As the ‘clandestine artist’ finally gets her due, she looks back on a rich life lived in defiance of convention
articles.content: PaintingShe grew up in the shadow of Kilimanjaro and never knew racism until moving to Europe. As the clandestine artist finally gets her due, she looks back on a rich life lived in defiance of conve… [+10318 chars]
